Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.models.booking_model module

class models.booking_model.BookingModel[source]

Bases: object

Model to manage bookings.

static create_table()[source]

Create bookings table if it doesn’t exist.

Creates table with foreign key constraints if referenced tables exist, otherwise creates without foreign keys.

static create_booking(bus_route_id: int, passenger_id: int, price: float) → int[source]

Create a new booking and return the booking ID.

Parameters:

  • bus_route_id (int) – ID of the bus route being booked.

  • passenger_id (int) – ID of the passenger making the booking.

  • price (float) – Price of the booking.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created booking.

Return type:

int

static get_bookings_by_passenger(passenger_id: int) → List[Dict][source]

Get all bookings for a specific passenger with route details.

Parameters:

passenger_id (int) – ID of the passenger.

Returns:

List of booking dictionaries with route information.

Each booking includes booking_id, bus_route_id, passenger_id, price, operator, route, departure_time, and capacity.

Return type:

List[Dict]

Raises:

Exception – If database error occurs.

static get_booking_by_id(booking_id: int) → Dict | None[source]

Get a booking by its ID.

Parameters:

booking_id (int) – The ID of the booking to retrieve.

Returns:

Booking dictionary if found, None otherwise.

Return type:

Optional[Dict]
